newsitem.title: JAPAN: MOF says will hold 10-year JGB auction on Tuesday.
newsitem.headline: MOF says will hold 10-year JGB auction on Tuesday.

text.p: The Ministry of Finance (MOF) will hold an auction of 10-year Japanese government bonds on Tuesday, a MOF official said on Monday.
Market sources said the coupon rate for the 10-year JGBs to be offered through an auction is likely to be 2.9 percent.
The size of the offer is expected to be around one trillion yen, a trader for a city bank's securities affiliate said.
